statements: DELETE FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 30.0 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE longitude < -70.0 OR timestamp > '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE device_id = 12345 AND latitude > 40.0
DELETE FROM asset_data WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM location_data WHERE longitude < -80.0)
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM asset_data WHERE asset_name = 'Computer' AND location_id = 54321)
DELETE FROM device_assets WHERE device_id = 1 AND asset_id = 2;
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1 AND location_lat > 40.0
DELETE FROM device_assets WHERE device_id = 3 AND asset_id = 5
DELETE FROM device_status WHERE device_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND connected = false;
DELETE FROM asset_management WHERE location_id = '65432123-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND last_inspected < '2022-06-01';
